text: Ashraf Hossain ( - 18 July 2020) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad between 1991 to 1996 and again from 2006 to 2008. Hossain was born in Dhaka. Hossain died on 18 July 2020 at a hospital in Dhaka from cancer, aged 79.Former whip Md Ashraf Hossain dies ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Dhaka Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Ashraf Hossain
